languages.text: "Арлекины — пугающие создания. Я не могу разобрать в пестрой мешанине их цветов истинных оттенков — словно все их существование есть одна затянувшаяся шутка".
"Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."
languages.original_text: "Арлекины — пугающие создания. Я не могу разобрать в пестрой мешанине их цветов истинных оттенков — словно все их существование есть одна затянувшаяся шутка".

traits.locale_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

languages.text: “丑角都是可怕的生物。我无法从它们那驳杂的色彩中分辨出它们真实的颜色，就好像他们的存在本身都是个年深岁久的笑话。”
languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

traits.locale_text: “丑角都是可怕的生物。我无法从它们那驳杂的色彩中分辨出它们真实的颜色，就好像他们的存在本身都是个年深岁久的笑话。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Les Arlequins sont vraiment des créatures effrayantes. C'est tout bonnement impossible de distinguer les nuances qui se cachent derrière ce méli-mélo de couleurs. Comme si leur existence même n'était qu'une vaste plaisanterie. »
languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

traits.locale_text: « Les arlequins sont vraiment des créatures effrayantes. C'est tout bonnement impossible de distinguer les nuances qui se cachent derrière ce méli-mélo de couleurs. Comme si leur existence même n'était qu'une vaste plaisanterie. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Los Arlequines son seres aterradores. No puedo distinguir sus verdaderos tonos en el remolino de sus colores. Es como si su existencia entera fuera una larga broma».
languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

traits.locale_text: «Los Arlequines son seres aterradores. No puedo distinguir sus verdaderos tonos en el remolino de sus colores. Es como si su existencia entera fuera una larga broma».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「ハーレクィンは恐ろしい生き物です。色とりどりの雑多な色彩の中で、彼らの本当の色合いを見分けることができません。まるで彼らの存在全体が、延々と冗談を言われ続けているようです」
languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

traits.locale_text: 「ハーレクィンは恐ろしい生き物です。色とりどりの雑多な色彩の中で、彼らの本当の色合いを見分けることができません。まるで彼らの存在全体が、延々と冗談を言われ続けているようです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Harlekine sind furchterregende Kreaturen. Ich kann ihre wahren Schattierungen nicht ausmachen, da sie von einer chaotischen Mischung aus Farben umgeben sind. Es ist, als sei ihre Existenz ein einziger langgezogener Witz."
languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

traits.locale_text: "Harlekine sind furchterregende Kreaturen. Ich kann ihre wahren Schattierungen nicht ausmachen, da sie von einer chaotischen Mischung aus Farben umgeben sind. Es ist, als sei ihre Existenz ein einziger langgezogener Witz."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

languages.text: "Arlekenler korkutucu yaratıklardır. Renklerinin karmaşasında gerçek tonlarını ayırt edemiyorum. Varlıkları dahi gereksizce uzatılmış bir şakadan farksız."
languages.original_text: "Harlequins are frightening creatures. I cannot discern their true hues in the motley jumble of their colours. It is as if their whole existence is one drawn-out joke."

traits.locale_text: "Arlekenler korkutucu yaratıklardır. Renklerinin karmaşasında gerçek tonlarını ayırt edemiyorum. Tüm hayatları, gereksizce uzatılmış bir şaka gibi."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
